text: The Girasia, or Garasia, Girasiya and Garasiya is a title used by the Koli chiefs of petty states or Jagirdars who held the villages as Giras granted by rulers. the most of the Chunvalia Kolis held the title of Girasia and they worshipped the Hindu goddess Shakti. The Koli Garasiya were tributary to the ruler of state who gave the Giras. == References == == Other websites == * Gujarat: The Long Fifteenth Century and the Making of a Region by Aparna Kapadiya Category:Koli titles
title: Girasia (Koli title)
